item.title: Cant play
item.dc:creator: @aydem22 aydem22
item.description:
@aydem22 wrote:

Stop saying “Mods please check!”. Iv’e seen about 3 answers so far that tell you how to fix this problem,
but you simply ignore them. Make sure you have set your Environmental Paths correctly, and if the problem continues, cancel all of your windows, and reopen MoparScape Client. From there, (keep MoparScape Client running) just open up new windows/tabs.

Read full topic
